TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SecurityUtilities extends System.Object
public ref class SecurityUtilities abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides a set of utility functions for manipulating security permision sets and signing.

span.span: Provides a set of utility functions for manipulating security permision sets and signing.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.PermissionSet ComputeZonePermissionSet (string targetZone, System.Security.PermissionSet includedPermissionSet, string[] excludedPermissions);

param.name: targetZone
param.span: Specifies a zone default permission set, which is obtained from machine policy.

span.span: Specifies a zone default permission set, which is obtained from machine policy.

param.span: Valid values are , , or .

span.span: Valid values are , , or .

param.span: If is specified, the generated permission set is based only on the includedPermissionSet parameter.

span.span: If is specified, the generated permission set is based only on the includedPermissionSet parameter.

param.name: includedPermissionSet
param.span: A object containing the set of permissions to be explicitly included in the generated permission set.

span.span: A object containing the set of permissions to be explicitly included in the generated permission set.

param.span: Permissions specified in this parameter will be included verbatim in the generated permission set, regardless of targetZone or excludedPermissions parameters.

span.span: Permissions specified in this parameter will be included verbatim in the generated permission set, regardless of targetZone or excludedPermissions parameters.

param.name: excludedPermissions
param.span: An array of permission identity strings to be excluded from the zone default permission set.

span.span: An array of permission identity strings to be excluded from the zone default permission set.

param.span: Permission identity strings can be computed using the method.

span.span: Permission identity strings can be computed using the method.

param.span: This parameter is ignored if targetZone is not or .

span.span: This parameter is ignored if targetZone is not or .

summary.span: Generates a permission set by computing the zone default permission set, removing any excluded permissions, and adding any included permissions.

span.span: Generates a permission set by computing the zone default permission set, removing any excluded permissions, and adding any included permissions.
Returns the generated permission set.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SignFile (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 cert, Uri timestampUrl, string path);

Public Shared Sub SignFile (cert As X509Certificate2, timestampUrl As Uri, path As String)

param.name: cert
param.span: The certificate to be used to sign the file.

span.span: The certificate to be used to sign the file.

param.name: timestampUrl
param.span: Indicates that the file is to be timestamped by the timestamp server at the specified HTTP address.

span.span: Indicates that the file is to be timestamped by the timestamp server at the specified HTTP address.

param.span: This parameter can be NULL if you do not want a timestamp.

span.span: This parameter can be NULL if you do not want a timestamp.

param.name: path
param.span: The name of the file to sign.

span.span: The name of the file to sign.

summary.span: Signs a ClickOnce manifest or PE file.

span.span: Signs a ClickOnce manifest or PE file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Essa função só pode assinar um arquivo PE se o parâmetro X509Certificate2 representa um certificado no repositório de certificados pessoais do usuário atual.This function can only sign a PE file if the X509Certificate2 parameter represents a certificate in the current user's personal certificate store. Esta sobrecarga do método chama SignTool.exe e, portanto, requer o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] para ser instalado.This overload of the method calls SignTool.exe and therefore requires the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to be installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta sobrecarga do método chama SignTool.exe e, portanto, requer o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] para ser instalado.This overload of the method calls SignTool.exe and therefore requires the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to be installed.

Signs a ClickOnce manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Essa função é apenas para assinar um manifesto, não é um arquivo PE.This function is only for signing a manifest, not a PE file.
